node.long_desc: The Orginal" work gloves;Form-fitting TrekDryhelps keep your hands cool and comfortable;Adjustable Thermoplastic Rubber (TPR) wrist closures create a secure fit;Reinforced thumb and index finger improve durability;Touchscreen capable synthetic leather provides the perfect blend of dexterity and durability;Machine washable;Great for: multipurpose, maintenance & repairs, equiptment operation, home improvement"
node.sales_desc: Despite its imitators, The Original is The Glove That Started It All. Tried, tested and proven for over 25 years, it delivers the perfect blend of dexterity and durability. The Original is built with carbon-infused touchscreen capable synthetic leather and breathable TrekDry to create the ultimate tool for hardworking hands. With a gamut of practical uses, it's no surprise that The Original is the most recognized and most frequently worn work glove by anyone with a toolbox.

node.long_desc: Wheel size available: 24x12;Gloss black finish;Construction: Cast Aluminum;Optional wheel rings sold separately

node.display_name: Timbren Axle SES Suspension Upgrade Kits
node.long_desc: Eliminate vehicle squatting and sagging;Cushion road shocks;Improve handling;Satisfaction guarantee;Lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc:
This SES Suspension Upgrade fits the front or rear suspensions. Timbren engineered their hollow rubber springs to deliver a progressive spring rate. In other words, the more weight that pushes down on the rubber springs the harder they work to prevent rear end sag. Whether you're pulling a trailer or carrying a heavy load in the bed of your truck, Tiimbren's hollow rubber springs adjust automatically to keep the vehicle level at all times.

This SES Suspension Upgrade replaces the jounce stop on the frame. Its unique design ensures superb ride quality loaded or unloaded. (There should be a 1/2 to 1-1/2" gap between rubber spring and axle to ensure unloaded ride quality.) Unlike other auxiliary spring systems, the SES Suspension Upgrade guarantees the best of both worlds."

node.long_desc: Maximize axle travel;Smooth axle engagement and disengagement;Enhance suspension performance;Progressive spring rate;Absorbs energy and cushions road shocks;Stronger than OEM bumpstops;Satisfaction guarantee;Lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc:
The Active Off-Road Bumpstops offer off-road enthusiasts greater control over their vehicles' suspension travel. Using progressive-rate springs means that instead of a hard stop at the end of axle travel the axle energy will be absorbed when bottoming-out producing smooth, predictable and quiet axle engagement and disengagement.

Unlike the OEM bumpstops, Timbren uses superior natural rubber compound ensuring the Active Off-Road Bumpstops will continue to operate even after a lifetime of off-road abuse. Similar to our Timbren SES line, Active Off-Road Bumpstops carry a LIFETIME WARRANTY & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE.

node.long_desc: Cold rolled 10-guage steel construction;Distinct angular drop down design step bar;Non-slip magnum branded diamond plate step for great look and grip;1/4-inch cold rolled steel mounting brackets;Easy installation - no drilling required
node.sales_desc:
Innovative Creations Inc Magnum RT Steps are the newest and unique Truck Side Step Bars. The RT Side Step Bar features a sharp drop down step design featuring a wide step area for easy entry and exit of your truck or Jeep. The Side Step Pads have a non-slip diamond tread for added safety and are slotted to allow drainage so that snow or mud does not collect as on a truck running board. The Magnum RT Side Step form fit to your truck or Jeep lower rocker protecting from rocks while off-roading and road grime on the street.
Designed and Engineered in the U.S.A., Magnum RT Side Steps are built to last. That's why Innovative Creations Inc offers a 1-year warranty on the finish and a Limited Lifetime on the Structure.

node.long_desc: CNC machined from 6061 aluminum;Hand finished to remove any machining imperfections;Type III engineered hardcoat" anodized to MIL-A-8625F Spec;The strongest and most abrasion resistant finish on earth;Laser etched logos;Universal DIY wiring kit with on/off switch and flash control button;Universal wiring kit may not be compatible with all vehicles;For use with synthetic winch line only;Hella MST-6 features 24 flash patterns including Steady-On;Weatherproof and vibration resistant;6 LEDs with max output 6 watts;5 year warranty"
node.sales_desc: Cascadia 4x4 is proud to introduce the world's first and only hawse fairlead with an integrated LED light. They took all the features of their best-selling hawse fairlead and upped the ante significantly by integrating the Hella MST-6 LED light (featuring 24 flash patterns). The light can be used as auxiliary lighting in steady-on mode to illuminate your winching area/road ahead, or as an emergency light in flash-mode. In order to provide you with a complete package we have included a universal DIY wiring kit* with flash controller.

node.display_name: Wilco Offroad ADV Low-Profile Bed Rack
node.long_desc: Lightweight aluminum construction;High-strength grade 10.9, zinc plated steel hardware;Bead blasted and powder coated finish;Fits most full, and mid-size pickups with 5 feet or 6 feet beds;Auxiliary mounting points for LED lighting (lights not included);Compatible with all rooftop tents and roof-mounted accessories, while keeping the bed below open for gear
node.sales_desc:
Introducing our new ADV-LP Bed rack. This low profile bed rack allows you to easily mount on the accessories you need to get outside, while keeping a lower center of gravity and less wind resistance.
This rack measures 14 inch tall from the top of your bed rail to the top of the cross bars.
The aluminum and steel construction keeps this light-weight but still able to be rock-solid and carry the heaviest of loads. Easy Bolt-on installation allows for hassle free installation and no drilling into the bed required.

node.display_name: Addictive Desert Designs ADD-Lander Overland Racks
node.long_desc: Hammer black powder coat finish;Satin black powder coat panel finish;Multiple universal mounting slots
node.sales_desc: Addictive Desert Designs ADD-Lander Overland Rack takes form and function to a whole new level. The rack uses a combination of tube and plate steel to create a unique look. The side rails and center cross members offer a series of slotted mounting holes to allow the use of almost any off-road accessory. The overland rack is extremely sturdy, allowing the use of heavier items up top, such as rooftop tents. No drilling or cutting required for installation. As always, this product is made in America.

node.long_desc: 1080p Full HD Image Sensor with 140-degree wide-angle lens;Ultra Low-Light Visibility and High Dynamic Range for superior night vision on the road;Works with the free Nexar Safe Driving App, (iOS and Android);Instantly report a crash directly to your participating insurance company (Including video, speed, and force of impact);Includes free storage for significant events and trip data in the Nexar Cloud;24/7 Nexar App Live Customer Support;Supports Micro-SD cards up to 128GB
node.sales_desc: The Scosche smart dash camera captures important visual evidence of accidents or events right from your vehicle. The 1080P, 140-degree wide angle forward-facing camera with a high definition low-light image sensor lens provides a clear view of objects for capturing the best shots and video in front of the vehicle. Record high quality video at night or in low light with the ultra-low light visibility and high dynamic range. Quickly and securely mount the camera to the vehicle's windshield using the (cut-to-fit) adhesive. The camera auto starts recording whenever you begin driving and stops as soon as you do. It works in the foreground or background. Use the auto-loop recording feature to seamlessly record new footage over previous footage. Press the capacitive touch event button to tag and upload significant events. Use one-click reporting to instantly report incidents to your insurance company with detailed evidence of the crash such as (video, speed, direction, license plates, faces and force of impact) which you can store on the included, commercial-grade 16GB micro-SD card. You can use micro-SD cards up to 64GB in size. 3-Axis accelerometer and G-sensor automatically sense and store crucial footage. Includes free storage for significant events and trip data in the Nexar cloud and is compatible with the Nexar safe driving app for iPhones and Android mobile devices. Seamlessly view recordings, events and integrate your GPS, Siri and Google assistant using the Nexar app. Easily connect the camera to internet by pressing the WiFi button. Quick release dock lets you remove the camera from the base and securely store it when not in use. Each package comes with a NEXC100 full HD adhesive camera, commercial grade 16GB micro-SD storage card, 24W dual-port (12W each) USB car adapter, 10 ft. 90-degree USB power cable, ties and installation tools. We back this amazing camera by 24/7 Live Tech Support and a 1-year warranty."

node.long_desc: Driver-side bracket;Passenger-side bracket;Grade 8 mounting hardware
node.sales_desc:
When Camburg developed our front bumper light bar mounts, we wanted something super secure for off-road use and streamlined with the stock bumper so it didn't look like an after thought.

Camburg's mounting brackets bolt onto the top of the stock bumper with some minor drilling and allow you to run Rigid's 40 RDS-Series Pro LED light bar. The mounts are laser cut, CNC formed, MIG welded and then powdercoated matte black, all in the USA. We also supply you the necessary grade 8 mounting hardware.

These were designed specific for the Rigid 40" RDS light bar which uses two mounting bolts on the side, but it can work with other lights out on the market with some minor modifications/drilling. You could also run a slightly narrower light bar as well."

node.long_desc: Available for front or rear;Extended in length;Includes mounting hardware
node.sales_desc: These are the same brake lines we use in our Camburg long-travel kit. They are extended in length, stainless steel braided and kevlar reinforced with an extra plastic layer for added protection. They come with everything you need and mount to the the factory calipers.
